title: Prescription for glasses or contact lenses in the UK 2014 , by country
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Countrys for 2 groups Yes, and No that are presented on the X-axis.
For Country Scotland, Yes had the highest Share of respondents 84.0 among the 2 groups and in Scotland, No had the lowest Share of respondents 16.0.
The maximum Share of respondents for No that was found in Country Wales was 2.06 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Country Scotland.
Averaging all 2 groups Yes, and No, the Country Northern Ireland is the maximum Share of respondents and Wales is the minimum Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Countrys for 2 groups Yes, and No that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Yes had the highest Share of respondents for Country Scotland and No had the lowest Share of respondents for Country Scotland.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Countrys for 2 groups Yes, and No that are presented on the X-axis.
For Country Scotland, Yes had the highest Share of respondents 84.0 among the 2 groups and in Scotland, No had the lowest Share of respondents 16.0.
The maximum Share of respondents for No that was found in Country Wales was 2.06 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Country Scotland.
Averaging all 2 groups Yes, and No, the Country Northern Ireland is the maximum Share of respondents and Wales is the minimum Share of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Yes, and No. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Country Scotland had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Yes. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Country Scotland for No.
Among all the Countrys, No had the highest Share of respondents 33.0 in Country Wales and lowest value 16.0 in Country Scotland.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for No in Country Wales and Scotland.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents was found in case of Yes.
Averaging all 2 groups Yes, and No, the Country Northern Ireland is the maximum Share of respondents and Wales is the minimum Share of respondents.
